title: The real reason our weather is going to the dogs
summary: Feedback was amazed to hear that dog ownership could cause a hurricane across the other side of the world. Or are we barking up the wrong tree?

title: MagSafe Monday: Pelican’s MagSafe Wallet is rugged and perfect for fall hikes and everyday carry
summary: As the weather cools down and fall hiking season ramps up, I always think about what gear makes sense to carry. A MagSafe wallet is one of those things that feels like it should be as versatile as your iPhone itself. The is a perfect option when you want something rugged that can handle the outdoor…
